name: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin'
storyline:
In the age of cowboys, adventurers the world over converge on El Dorado, an ancient city of gold.
However, their highly coveted prize is guarded by a strange magical seal - an everchanging labyrinth of caverns and canyons.
No one has come out alive, but maybe you will find the treasure you seek.
summary: Battle through treacherous levels in this fast-paced, turn-based, six-shooting Rogue-like. Pit your wits against cunning creatures in an everchanging labyrinth of caverns and canyons to reach the ancient city of gold.
